name: Robert F. CROWELL, Administrator of the Estate of Marc Ethan Crowell, Deceased, and Robert F. Crowell and Linda Crowell, as Plaintiffs in their own right v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, City of Philadelphia and Henry B. Lewis. Petition of Henry B. LEWIS, Petitioner

parties: Robert F. CROWELL, Administrator of the Estate of Marc Ethan Crowell, Deceased, and Robert F. Crowell and Linda Crowell, as Plaintiffs in their own right v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, City of Philadelphia and Henry B. Lewis. Petition of Henry B. LEWIS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER:
PER CURIAM.
And now, this 7th day of November, 1990, this Petition is granted, limited to the issue of the interpretation of 42 Pa.C.S. § 8542(b) in light of our decision in Mascaro v. Youth Study Center, 514 Pa. 351, 523 A.2d 1118 (1987).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
582 A.2d 1311
Robert F. CROWELL, Administrator of the Estate of Marc Ethan Crowell, Deceased, and Robert F. Crowell and Linda Crowell, as Plaintiffs in their own right v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, City of Philadelphia and Henry B. Lewis. Petition of Henry B. LEWIS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 7, 1990.
